text: does anyone know some DMRG from scratch tutorials that I can reference to? I found <https://simple-dmrg.readthedocs.io/en/latest/using.html> but wondering if there are others

text: it’s not a tutorial, but could still be interesting: the ITensors.jl package provides a nice DMRG implementation (based on Matrix Product States, though): <https://www.itensor.org/docs.cgi?page=formulas/basic_dmrg&vers=julia>
